title: Motivation-Driven Science Job Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Core scientific theories and comprehension of experimental methodologies
context.additional_context: Offline classroom instruction for working professionals conducted in a BYOD environment, operated through a mixed-methods research design incorporating formative assessments for continuous monitoring of learning outcomes and motivation strategies

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% engagement in activities designed based on the music motivation model.
Learners perform science problem-solving tasks incorporating motivational elements (curiosity, challenge, feedback) with 90% accuracy.
Learners demonstrate improved satisfaction, averaging 4.0 points or higher (on a 5-point scale) in learning motivation surveys.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
